title: Venetian seafood risotto
description: I have written recipes for seafood risotto before but never made it with the distinctive mix of spices so particular to Venice, which I call a Byzantine spice mix. As with all my mixed seafood dishes, the ingredients are only what I would like. Feel free to use whatever you do.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz flatfish bones (such as brill, sole, plaice) or fillets
2 red mullet fillets, cut diagonally into strips
1 squid, body cut into rings, plus tentacles
salt and freshly ground black pepper
